pr_title: Fix create object value getting null strand passing

timeline.bodyText: visitFrame should be automatically injected by asm, please try removing those.
timeline.author: manuranga

timeline.bodyText: don't think conditionLinkLabel is used, we can remove it.
timeline.author: manuranga

timeline.bodyText: please remove getScheduler method, since Scheduler.getStrand() is costly (because it access a thread local) it should be called ones. assign the strand to a local var and access the scheduler form there.
timeline.author: manuranga

replies.bodyText: I modified considering all suggestions in this

timeline.bodyText: when can an exception occur here?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: Null pointer exception is thrown if the strand is null.
replies.author: HindujaB

replies.bodyText: Caching Exception or any runtime exceptions like NullPointerExcption is not a best practice. Replace it with a null check.
replies.author: manuranga

timeline.bodyText: can we link the created issue here ?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: Added issue reference in the latest commit
replies.author: HindujaB

timeline.message: Add issue reference to the code

timeline.bodyText: no need to catch Exception for this, just do a null check. Caching Exception is a last resort solution, should try to avoid it when possible.
timeline.author: manuranga

timeline.bodyText: Lets make this method call the other createObjectValue, that way we can remove most of the body in this method. see default parameter pattern here : https://www.baeldung.com/java-default-parameters-method-overloading
timeline.author: manuranga

timeline.bodyText: let's add a deprecated annotation here.
timeline.author: manuranga
